MSG.ShortText: Out of memory
MSG.Description: A memory allocation failed. The requested $MEMREQUEST$ bytes could not be made available.

MSG.ShortText: Storing execution plan failed
MSG.Description: Insertion of an execution plan into SharedSQL failed. Further execution of the statement takes place without SharedSQL.

MSG.ShortText: Object not initialized
MSG.Description: A class and an object were used without having been initialized.

MSG.ShortText: Could not add table $FILENO$ to request file $FILENO1$
MSG.Description: During the computation of table statistics in the course of an 'UPDATE STATISTICS' statement, a serious error occurred causing the statement to abort.

MSG.ShortText: Preparation of internal SQL statement failed
Could not create new statement context; error $RETURNCODE$
Creation of internal connection failed; error $RETURNCODE$
Insert into SYSUPDSTATLOG failed for table $FILENO$; ignoring $RETURNCODE$
MSG.Description: An internal insertion operation into the table SYSUPDSTATLOG aborted. The execution of the current SQL statement is continued, however it may be the case that not all tables whose statistics were determined are listed in the table SYSUPDSTATLOG.

MSG.ShortText: Update of SYSUPDSTATLOG failed due to lock collision
MSG.Description: An internal insertion operation into the table 'SYSUPDSTATLOG' failed due to lock collision. The execution of the current SQL statement is aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Storing of updated statistics for table $FILENO$ failed
MSG.Description: The current statistics for the table with the file ID $FILENO$ could not be stored. The execution of the current SQL statement must be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Storing of updated statistics for table $FILENO$ failed, error: $ERRORTEXT$
MSG.Description: The current statistics for the table with the file ID $FILENO$ could not be stored. The execution of the current SQL statement must be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Invalid table type $TABLE_TYPE$ of table $FILENO$ for update statistics
MSG.Description: The table with the file ID $FILENO$ is of type $TABLE_TYPE$. No statistics can be updated for this table type. The execution of the current SQL statement must be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Locking of statistics record for table $FILENO$ failed; error = $RETURNCODE$
MSG.Description: The record with the table statistics for the table with the file ID '$FILENO$' in the catalog could not be locked.

MSG.ShortText: Could not get catalog information for table $FILENO$, error = $ERROR_NUMBER$
MSG.Description:
An attempt to determine the catalog entry for the table with the file number $FILENO$ failed due to an unexpected error. The execution of the current SQL statement had to be aborted.
The unexpected error number is $ERROR_NUMBER$ and the corresponding error text is $ERRORTEXT$.

MSG.ShortText: Could not create new statement context; error $RETURNCODE$
MSG.Description: No new statement context could be created during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Creation of internal connection failed; error $RETURNCODE$
MSG.Description: A serious error occurred during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Could not prepare internal update statement, error $ERRORTEXT$
MSG.Description: A serious error occurred during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Preparation of parameters for internal statement failed, error $ERRORTEXT$
MSG.Description: A serious error occurred during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Preparation of parameters for internal statement failed
MSG.Description: A serious error occurred during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Could not prepare internal insert statement, error $ERRORTEXT$
MSG.Description: A serious error occurred during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Could not switch user, error $ERRORTEXT$
MSG.Description: A serious error occurred during the internal insertion of a record into the table SYSCHECKTABLELOG. The command had to be aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Internal insert into SYSUPDSTATLOG failed, error $ERRORTEXT$
Internal insert into SYSUPDSTATWANTED failed, error $ERRORTEXT$
Creation of internal connection failed; error $RETURNCODE$
Creation of internal delete statement failed
MSG.Description: An attempt to delete a row in the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error.

MSG.ShortText: Creation of internal select statement failed
MSG.Description: An attempt to initialize an iterator onto the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error.

MSG.ShortText: Unexpected error when retrieving table descriptor, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Unexpected error when retrieving table descriptor, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description:
The execution of an internal delete operation for a row in the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error while retrieving a table descriptor in the catalog.
The table ID of the table is: $TABID$. The returned error code is: $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is: '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Unexpected error when retrieving index descriptor, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Unexpected error when retrieving index descriptor, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Unexpected error when retrieving index descriptor, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description:
The execution of an internal delete operation for a row in the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error while retrieving an index descriptor in the catalog.
The index number of the sought index is $INDEX$. The table ID of the corresponding table is $TABID$.
The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Error when binding parameters for internal SQL statement
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during the execution of an internal delete operation for a row in the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED'

MSG.ShortText: Could not delete row in 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED', error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description: The deletion of a row in the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error. The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Could not select from 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED', error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description: The internal selection on the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error. The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Unexpected error when retrieving table descriptor in iterator, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Unexpected error when retrieving table descriptor in iterator, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Unexpected error when retrieving table descriptor in iterator, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description:
The Initialization of an internal iterator onto the system table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error while retrieving a table descriptor in the catalog.
The schema of the table is $SCHEMANAME$. The name of the table is $TABLENAME$.
The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Could not create internal transaction, basis error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during the creation of an internal transaction. The error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Error during close of internal transaction, base error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during close of an internal transaction. The transaction should be closed with the following action: '$COMMAND_NAME$'. The error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Unexpected error while retrieving index descriptor in iterator, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description:
The Initialization of an internal iterator onto the system table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error while retrieving an index descriptor in the catalog. The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.
The name of the sought index is '$INDEXNAME$'. The table ID of the corresponding table is '$TABID$'.

MSG.ShortText: Error when removing broken row, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description:
An error occurred during the removing of a broken row in the system table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED'. The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.
The qualification of the row to be deleted is: Schema name: '$SCHEMANAME$' Table name: '$TABLENAME$' Index name: '$INDEXNAME$'

MSG.ShortText: Table '$FILENO$' could not be locked, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred while attempting to lock the table with the file ID '$FILENO$'. The basis error is $BASIS_ERROR$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Preparation of server task job for table '$FILENO$' failed
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during the background initialization of the file directory statistics counters. The initialization of the statistics counters was aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Start of update counter job failed
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during the background initialization of the file directory statistics counters. The initialization of the statistics counters was aborted.

MSG.ShortText: Background initialisation of file directory statistics counters started
MSG.Description: A process was started within the database, which automatically computes the initial statistics information such as space consumption and number of rows of a table/index, and stores them in the internal database file directory whenever the database is idle. As soon as these counts are computed, they are automatically updated in the additional operation. This initialization is only done once for each table. Tables, whose statistics counters are still to be initialized, are entered into the system table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED'

MSG.ShortText: Background initialisation of file directory statistics counters finished successfully
MSG.Description: The identification of the statistics information for the file directory statistics counters finished successfully.

MSG.ShortText: Background initialisation of file directory statistics counters cancelled
MSG.Description: The internal background process for the identification of statistics information for the file directory statistics counters was aborted by a user.

MSG.ShortText: Background initialisation of file directory statistics counters aborted
MSG.Description: The identification of the initial values for the file directory statistics counters were aborted due to a system error.

MSG.ShortText: Background initialisation of file directory statistics counters for file '$FILENO$' delayed
MSG.Description: The identification of the statistics information for the file directory statistics counters for the table with the file ID '$FILENO$' was aborted by the user. The statistics for this table are computed at a later time.

MSG.ShortText: Could not allocate $ALLOC_SIZE$ bytes, attempting to continue
MSG.Description: Out of main memory during the background initialization of the file directory statistics counters. Processing was aborted, but will be continued at a later time.

MSG.ShortText: Error when removing broken row, error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Error when removing broken row
MSG.Description:
Deletion of a broken row in the system table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' produced an unexpected error.
The qualification of the row to be deleted is: File ID: '$FILENO$'

MSG.ShortText: All file directory statistics counters initialized
MSG.Description: The system table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED' does not contain any requests for the initialization of information concerning space consumption and entry count of tables in the internal database file directory.

MSG.ShortText: System error occured while waiting for server task to finish
Unexpected error when trying to write savepoint: $BASIS_ERROR$
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during the background initialization of the file directory statistic counters, while writing a save point to set the changes to the statistics counters.

MSG.ShortText: Unexpected error while committing changes to request table
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred while committing changes to the table 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED'

MSG.ShortText: Preparation of internal SQL statement failed, rc = $RETURNCODE$
System error during update of table SYSUPDSTATLOG
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during processing of an 'Update Statistics' statement, while updating a row of the system table SYSUPDSTATLOG.

MSG.ShortText: Could not delete row in 'SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED', error '$ERRORTEXT$'
MSG.Description: Deletion of a row in the table 'SYSUPDSTATWANTED' produced an unexpected error. The returned error code is $RETURNCODE$. The corresponding error text is '$ERRORTEXT$'.

MSG.ShortText: Creation of internal delete statement for SYSUPDSTATWANTED failed
MSG.Description: An attempt to delete a row in the table 'SYSUPDSTATWANTED' produced an unexpected error.

MSG.ShortText: Error when binding parameters for internal SQL statement for table SYSUPDSTATWANTED
MSG.Description: An unexpected error occurred during the execution of an internal delete request for a row in the table 'SYSUPDSTATWANTED'.

MSG.ShortText: File '$FILENO$' not found; error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Error writing log entry; error '$BASIS_ERROR$'
File type mismatch: logical = '$FILETYPE$', physical = '$FILETYPE1$'
Error during temp file creation
Type: '$FILETYPE$', pl: $NUMBER$, l: $NUMBER1$, sl: $NUMBER2$, index: $NUMBER3$, fileNo: $FILENO$
Error during reset of file '$FILENO$'; error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Temp file already exists: '$FILENO$'
Error while resetting a temporary file
Error during temp file destruction. FileNo '$FILENO$', error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Error during creation of temp file '$FILENO$'; error '$ERRORTEXT$'
File must be of type temp; fileNo '$FILENO$'
Invalid logical file name: '$FILENAME$'
Unexpected return value while checking file state: fileNo '$FILENO$', error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Initialisation of SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED monitoring failed. Error '$ERRORTEXT$'
Automatic initialisation of file directory counters stopped due to system error
Start of server task for SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED failed; monitoring of SYSUPDATECOUNTERWANTED stopped
Creation of internal insert statement failed
